data.title: Cushman Minute Misers
data.meta-title: Used Cushman Minute Miser Electric Burden Carriers
data.meta-description: Find general information, specifications, manufacturer documentation, and special pricing on Used Cushman Minute Miser Electric Utility Carts. Cushman Minute Misers are highly maneuverable, vehicles designed to carry your staff and their tools around your facility efficiently. Used Cushman Minute Misers are available at % off the price of new from American Surplus, buy quality used equipment and save!

ul.li: 24V Direct Drive Motor moves your team around the warehouse in moments instead of minutes
550 lb. Capacity supports your staff and their toolboxes
Powder coated welded steel frame & diamond plate body stands up to harsh environments

long-description.p: The Cushman Minute Miser is designed to help your crew get around your facility efficiently, reducing travel times and cutting wasted moments out of your team's schedule. Long walks around the warehouse are wasted minutes, and the Cushman Minute Miser is your way to take those precious minutes back. Featuring a quick and agile DC motor that offers top speeds of up to 10mph, your crew will never be too far from the next project. Despite their small profile, Cushmman Minute Misers include room for up to two riders, with the second seat being convertible into into a cargo deck, giving your team's fleet the flexibility they need to set the standard for productivity every day.

Used Cushman Minute Miser Utility Vehicles are now available at American Surplus at prices up to % off the price of new! Our inventory is always changing, so don't hesitate to call our office at (800) 876-3736 to speak to our sales team and get the latest updates on our inventory!
